root.Summary: 1: Cho LY, Yang JJ, Ko KP, Ma SH, Shin A, Choi BY, Kim HJ, Han DS, Song KS, KimYS, Chang SH, Shin HR, Kang D, Yoo KY, Park SK. Gene polymorphisms in theornithine decarboxylase-polyamine pathway modify gastric cancer risk byinteraction with isoflavone concentrations. Gastric Cancer. 2015Jul;18(3):495-503. doi: 10.1007/s10120-014-0396-5. Epub 2014 Jul 31. PubMed PMID:25079701.
